posts.post_content:
Hello all,
Doing a little house cleaning tonight and looking to sell these three.

Eddie Collins Sweet Cap 350, 25 (tough card), paper loss back, super clean front, scrape on front does not look nearly that bold in real life- $SOLDD to Tony O
Gandil SOV 460- crease lower left, glue damage back- $SOLD, thanks Luke
Bobby Wallace SOV 150 amazing SGC 40, super bright- $SOLDDD

emails come first.
Thanks for thhe time,
Bob
[url]upperhandisforemost@yahoo.com[/url]
